title: Only Recommend if you have children along
review: Only Recommend if you have children along and have planned at-least 2-3 days in Dehradun. not a lot many things to do however you may enjoy the location.

title: Nothing special
review: The park is just like any other park with green trees, swings etc. There's nothing good or special in the park. You can see the hills of Mussorie around the corner

title: Peaceful & clean park
review: Park is nicely maintained & views from it is quite serene (small water stream nearby). Peaceful park & good for kids too.

title: Small park
review: A smallish but well maintained park on the Rajpur Road... The views from the rear end of the park are good.... Outside the park, there is a Pakoda shop run buy a Sikh... Good Pakoras...

title: Eye pleaseing
review: The park is situated at foot of masoorie. It has nice views and landscape area.

title: Just a park!! Nothing more!!
review: It's just a normal small park and nothing more. Poorly maintained.From one corner of the park you can see natural beauty like mountains and river.

title: A local picnic spot.
review: This is just a park, a minutes drive up North of Pacific Mall on the Rajpur Road. Some view of the Valley is nice, but you get such nice views; even more beautiful, all the up to Mussoori. The Park  seems popular with locals. Nothing for a tourist visiting Doon. Can be skipped. The park is maintained by the Government agency, the MDDA.

title: MDDA Park in Dehradun
review: This park started good but has not been nurtured properly over time. Still it offers a breath taking view of the valley below with hills all around. There is a small cafe for snacking. It has an Amiptheatre but it is not very comfortable since small steps to negotiate from one level to next in this theatre are not provided and seniors find it very difficult to get down or come up these huge sitting arrangement for shows that are occasionally held. There is a nominal entry fee and parking fee for vehicles.

title: Nice green place
review: It is a very good place which has wonderful environment. It also has good food options and nice parking as well

title: Great ambiance
review: Such a peaceful place so to say.... The place is green and beautiful... Really refreshing and cheerful atmosphere...... One can go if you wanna be in the arms of nature with beautiful trees around you plus the freshness of the air surrounding you..... The fresh air, cool breeze, the trees swiftly making some soft sounds.... All so charming and attracting... Lots of couples though.... Yet good place to hang out wid ur love ones.....

title: A good point  in Dehradun to get view of Himalayan peaks and valley
review: The park located in the foothills of Himalayas provides a nice panaromic view of Lower Himalayan peaks and valley. Park has quiet serene atmosphere. Eatery is also availble for snacks etc.There are swings for children, and a small fish acquarium.

title: One among few Children park
review: Its a good park ...reaosnably clean and children's parks are not something that you find easily in dehradun... must visit if you have young children in and around Jakhan

title: Beauty
review: Good park neat and clean surroundings. It is a very quite place.

title: For Relaxing & kids
review: beautiful location in Rajpur, specially for kids to enjoy the rides & relaxing , just 1 km from hotel

title: An Evening snack Point
review: Buy some pakoras from the Sardar ji at the corner shop of the Rajpur. Enjoy them in the MDDA park. Place specially for couples, nice photographic scenery and landscape. A group travelling to Mussorie can stop by for a break here.

title: Best place to roam around
review: Best place to roam around .

title: well maintained park
review: Park is well maintained with enough lush greenery. Kids would enjoy the place for spending time in the park. View from the top is nice on one side

title: A HIDDEN GEM IN DEHRADUN!!
review: I visited this park in the month of june.....twas raining cats and dogs.....was there with my love shivering due to rain.....we swung the swings which was way too romantic......then took a lazy stroll and were surprised by the serenity of the place....its often known as a nice olace for love birds but belive me its all good and normal here for the family as well....excellent walking tracks and the stream flowing below!!!loved it!!sprawling greenery!!The lawns are great to sit around for a picnic. Great family outing with kids.THATS' IT...SPARE 30 MINUTES OF YOUR LIFE FOR THIS MUST VISIT!!!!

title: Small park
review: Malsi dear park is a mini zoo with few swings for the children. Very close to nature it is surrounded by hills, has water. Kids enjoy to see animals.. but there are way too many monkey. It becomes difficult to manage kids and food with monkey all around.

title: The Simple City Park
review: If you like to have free evening and interested to spend some time with the nature with your family and friends, you may visit the park. there are lots of facilities for children to play, and elders to sit walk and spend lazy time or run jog and talk.

title: it can be renamed as love park
review: it has got a beautiful scenery around. it is like a terrace garden only with benches added to sit and enjoy the view. but the love birds of dehradun have flocked this park. if you are on a honeymoon, you can try this place. if with a family, just let the kids play and then fled off.

title: Clean and Green
review: The location of the park is one of the best things about it. There's a beautiful view of the hills, which gets even better when mist descends over them during the rains. A small brook can also be seen flowing below the park. The view is exquisite at sunset.

title: Good View
review: This is an excellent place to visit, all year round but specially during Winter. During Winter, you can enjoy good view as well as Winter Sunshine can be enjoyed.

title: Nice place to go with kids
review: Good place to go with kids and enjoy on a sunny afternoon in winters. The view is very nice and the kids can enjoy on the swings.

title: Perfect for children
review: If you have a youngster or two - take them here for a safe place to play. Otherwise, on a clear day, OK for the views...

title: Amazing
review: That's the only word to describe this place- Amazing! It's so beautiful, quiet and serene one would just want to spend hours out there. And unlike a lot other such places this is clean, and I mean almost squeaky clean.

title: terrace park on Rajpur Ridge
review: the park is beutiful, terraces give breathtaking view of valley,
